name: Abid Hanifusaffly
content: Afnizar is a responsible, hardworking, and pays crazy attention to detail. He possesses a strong foundation in UI design. When it comes to UI design, he's got some seriously solid skills. Plus, he's an awesome teacher when it comes to UI stuff. He explains things in a way that totally makes sense and isn't afraid to give his own opinions. Honestly, a lot of my work is inspired by the design fundamentals and perspectives he has taught, such as achieving pixel-perfect designs, maintaining neat organization in design delivery, and naming pages in design files. His work, Page Automator, has always been my go-to tool when preparing a new file in Figma.

name: Moreno Duvadilon
content: Nizar is an outstanding UI/X person and has the comprehensive knowledge to turn product requirements into a comprehensive design solution. He has the capability to present structured information efficiently for the customer, anticipating their future actions (navigation or flow) through the app. Analytical and pragmatic person to ask the right questions and use the knowledge to refine the design or prototype. which makes him stand out and a great team player.

name: Miftahul Awali Rizkina
content: Afnizar is a highly curious person. When he designs something, he always pays attention to the details. He has proven himself capable of research and analysis before undertaking any task. He is also one of the most dedicated and hardworking people I've ever worked with. I highly recommend Afnizar to anyone who needs expertise in design and seamless collaboration, as he is a person who can learn and adapt quickly and deliver excellent results!

name: Kukuh Sulistyo
content: As a Frontend Engineer, collaborating with Afnizar has been an absolute pleasure, and I cannot emphasize enough the positive impact he has had on our work. One of my greatest strengths is my ability to bring designs to life and create seamless user experiences. However, it is Afnizar who truly elevates my work with his exceptional design skills. His creativity, attention to detail, and deep understanding of user-centered design principles have consistently impressed me. Afnizar has always been receptive to my input and open to collaboration. He possesses a remarkable ability to take my technical constraints into consideration while still delivering visually stunning designs. This synergy has allowed us to create highly functional and aesthetically pleasing products together.

name: Adwin Dwitaufani
content: Afnizar is an excellent collaborator, actively listening to our needs and translating them into actionable design solutions. As a designer, he understands how to implement designs that make sense through coding. Afnizar has a remarkable ability to grasp complex concepts and transform them into intuitive and visually appealing interfaces that resonate with our target audience.

name: Rezky Pangestu
content: Afnizar is really a great product designer. We have working together multiple times across various company. He has a great sense on how the product should be designed. He knows about accessibility, and always put the user first on building the product. He understands on how the technical side works, so he can determine whether the product is technically feasible or not. He is also a friendly individual, making it comfortable to collaborate with him as part of a team.
